replies.body:
{{champion:112}} **Don't think that you two can beat me. I have with me the ultimate weapon. Capable of destroying everything in mere seconds.** 

{{champion:126}} No don't tell me

{{champion:72}} **It can't be**

{{champion:112}} **hehehehe**

{{champion:72}} {{champion:126}} Battlecasted Xerath!!?

{{champion:112}} What? No no..I was talking about me. I am the ultimate weapon. 


{{champion:126}} Oh..he just talking about himself. So Xerath isn't here. 

{{champion:72}} **Oh thank god. Where is that one anyway?**

{{champion:112}} **Ummm....**



*Elsewhere*

{{champion:101}} **I told you I am not the Real Xerath, I am just a robot copy of him**

{{champion:268}} You can't lie to me anymore Xerath!!! This time you will not escape!!!

*Back at the plot*

{{champion:112}} **He is...busy at the moment. But it doesn't matter, for now you will have to face me and my new Perfect Hextech Core.**

{{champion:126}} Let finish this. Ready Skarner?

{{champion:72}} **READY!!**
Lol{{champion:107}} will hunt you down
{{champion:150}} You made a terrible mistake.

{{champion:126}} "Don't worry Skarner, he got a rework so he should be easy to finish off."
{{champion:112}} **"I'M STILL GOOD! I mean bad, um, whatever."**
I laughed really hard on the Xerath and Azir part :)

Thank you. I actually didn't have that written down for today, but as I am putting these in it just came to me and I was like "I got to write this down. I know it last minute, but I have to write this down."
Will shurima ever come into play with your story like they then have to fight a shurima sand army? Oh and I have a question where is this all taking place. Keep up the good work! :D

1)....maybe. 

2) This battle is taking place outside Piltover city.

sorry I butchered your name. :)

Thank you. :D

Hey guys, I'm going to be starting up a series of posts called "How I Joined the League." basically stories of how different champions joined the League from their perspective (most of the time) and with more detail than their original lores described their coming. I would like to know if anyone has a preference or a suggestion on which champion they want to see first. If not, I'll probably start with {{champion:92}}Riven
Yorick Mori

Alrighty then, I was hoping not to get into the Shadow Isles so quickly, but Yorick sounds like alot of fun. See you guys Monday!



{{champion:83}} Coming Soon...
{{champion:238}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:134}}
Oh yes kennen please do it for kennen general keith

I sort of rushed into a decision a little too fast, but Kennen is really underloved. I might be able to do him on 6th (of September) if he is suggested. :D I'll remember for next time not to rush into a decision of who I should do.

We introduced Lucian into League of Legends as the first black champion. But seeing as the League is full of Racists we figured it would be a pretty good idea to make his first skin make him white. As a community we feel that this will separate the good Lucians from the Greats.
